Template.Name: New_User_Request
Template.Subject: [accountDefinition:/hostDisplayName] User Request
Template.Body:
The following user account request has been submitted to you through [accountDefinition:/hostDisplayName]:

Name: [userDefinition:/lastFirstName]
Email: [userDefinition:/email]
Phone: [userDefinition:/voicePhone]
Company: [accountDefinition:/companyName]
Title: [userDefinition:/title]

To take action on this registration request (approve or deny) please follow this link:[linkDefinition:/accountChangeAccountInfo]

Please note that the user will not be able to access [accountDefinition:/hostDisplayName] until you approve the registration request and set up their permissions.
